name: A Hike in the Woods
description:
A Hike in the Woods

Audio is strongly recommended.

____________________________________________________________

Default Controls (controls can be changed in settings):

W/A/S/D to move

(Hold) Right Mouse Button to take out camera

Left Mouse Button to take photo

E to interact with objects

Esc/Q to pause

____________________________________________________________

Programmer & 3D Artist: lucaszilke

3D Artist: Ashkandi

Composer: daamatsa#5503

Writer & Narrative Designer: alveromancy

Dialogue Editor: Vera Tan

with the voice talents of…

Vera Tan — Charlie & Robin

Maxwell Walter Osborne — Marcus & Jasper

Joe Kilcarr — Phone Operator

____________________________________________________________

A game made in 10 days for ‘Untitled Game Jam #76’.

____________________________________________________________

Content warnings: cartoon blood & mild horror
